title: The journal of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Scott, Walter

title: Memoirs of the life and writings of Thomas Chalmers...
author: Hanna, William
snippet: The only written notice taken by himself of a day so memorable in his history, occurs in the following letter to Lady Stuart of Allanbank :

title: Domestic details
author: Crossrig, David Hume
snippet: The first money I got was from Peter Gibson, in Allanbank.
